actions.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
Mr. Serrano demanded a separate vote on the Gilman amendment (A032).
On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment removes the current prohibition against providing military assistance to countries which have be decertified for not having fully cooperated with the U.S. regarding anti-narcotics activities.
purpose: An amendment to remove the current prohibition against providing military assistance to those countries which have be decertified for not having fully cooperated with the U.S. regarding anti-narcotics activities.
